When it comes to battle style, enjoy it co-op, PvP, or solo - play it your way! There's no wrong way to play. Where will your story take you?

name: Infinite Block Puzzle
description: A block puzzle game with over 1000 block puzzles.

name: Crown Solitaire: Card Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Soul Reverse
description: Soul Reverse is a fantasy-themed multiplayer arcade game where two teams with up to ten players in each compete in battles. The game is class-based and the player can choose to play as warrior, knight, mage, or ranger. Each class has its own specialization with the knight excelling at close combat with sword and shield while the ranger uses its longbow to take out enemies from afar. The warrior is all-round while the mage uses a wand to launch magic attacks. The titular souls are the legendary heroes King Arthur, Lancelot and Pandora that can be summoned in combat. Each has its own special abilities called soul reverses that can be activated once the player's reverse gauge has been filled up.

name: Hoppenhelm
description:
Jump over pitfalls, razor-sharp spikes and crumbling blocks. Deflect flying fireballs, enemy attacks and axe swings. Bust open doors to secret rooms full of lava and gather shiny coins.

Sir Hoppenhelm is lost down in the dungeon of his castle Dunkelburg and must jump, block and slash his way back to safety before the rising lava gets him. Collect coins to unlock allies with unique abilities or expand your armory with new neat weapons.

Hoppenhelm is:
• Arcade platform action
• One handed controls
• Randomly generated levels with progression
• Challenging gameplay
• Unlockable characters and weapons
• Leaderboards
• Fancy sprites and juicy animations
• Bouncy chiptune soundtrack
• In-app purchase to remove ads
• Made with love :D

Thank you for playing <3

name: Rush
description:
Are you ready for a thrilling ride?

Rush through the void while dodging obstacles in this endless roller coaster ride. Think quick and tap to switch lanes in order to reach incredible speeds!

◉ Complete 100 challenges
◉ Rank up by gathering XP
◉ Collect 50 spheres (including 5 secrets)
◉ Receive daily rewards
◉ Unlock 25 roads
◉ Compare your high score with players worldwide

Download now and experience Rush!

name: American MahJong Practice 2017
description:
Real American MahJong with Charleston. Not a tile matching game.

American MahJong Practice 2017 is a great way to learn new scorecards, practice quick hands or play for fun. Test game strategy with replay option. 

For beginners, reference Standard American MahJong rules online.

Use patterns from any league scorecard or your own. Patterns are not validated. 

A game ends when you mahjong or the tiles run out.

name: Parking Escape
description:
The goal of this game is to get your car out of a six-by-six grid full of automobiles by moving the other vehicles out of its way.
Parking Escape is a simple and a nice game.

name: The Escapists 2: Special Edition
description: The Escapists 2: Special Edition combines the crafting, stealing, brawling escape-athon of The Escapists 2, with the zany themed prisons and customisations of the Season Pass to craft the ultimate breakout experience!

name: WRC Collection FIA World Rally Championship
description:
Revive las 3 últimas temporadas del World Rally Championship con la Colección WRC, que incluye WRC 5, WRC 6 y WRC 7, además de contenidos adicionales.

WRC 5 — Primera edición de la nueva etapa de la saga, producida por Kylotonn Racing Games, que presenta la temporada 2015. Aprende de forma progresiva los conceptos básicos de la conducción de rallies con la Escuela de rally.

WRC 6 — Se consigue un nuevo nivel de realismo para la saga gracias a la integración de las etapas superespeciales a escala real. WRC 6 también ofrece por primera vez un modo multijugador con pantalla partida.

WRC 7 — Más realista todavía, WRC 7 ofrece todo el contenido de la temporada 2017, en especial las nuevas versiones de los World Rally Cars, notablemente más potentes y ágiles que la generación anterior. Con el añadido de las Epic Stages, WRC 7 supone un auténtico reto, incluso para los jugadores más veteranos.

name: Front Line Pack
description:
Are you always playing Front Line Champions and securing the point for your team? We’ve got just what you need: the Front Line Pack, which rewards players who are tough and selfless with a whole bunch of goodies. PLUS we’ll throw in the Limited Enforcer Fernando Skin! It’s a good time to be a tank!

Breach and clear the capture point with the Enforcer Fernando Skin. 

Show off how awesome you are with the Stat Tracking Spray. Unlock 5 Legendary Cards for Front Line Champions with Legendary Enchanted Keys. And bank 10,000 VIP Points to grab an Epic item in the VIP Store.

The Front Line Pack includes:
Enforcer Fernando Skin
Legendary Stat Tracking Spray
5 Front Line Legendary Keys
5 Radiant Chests
10,000 VIP Points

name: Shin Tennis no Ouji-sama: RisingBeat
description: Rhythm game of The New Prince of Tennis released on iOS and Android devices.

name: Smart Junior Academy - Spring
description: Entertaining educational game for children. 20 varied exercises designed in cooperation with child psychology experts in order to support development of memory, concentration and mathematical skills, as well as to extend their common knowledge. Attractive spring theme with warm colors.

name: 40 Days
description: 40 Days is a special strategy simulation game related with infectious diseases spread all over the city. You, as a head of quarantine department, have been given full authority and manpower to contain the city, deal with different parties, virus in the city and most importantly find out the cure.

name: KungFu Town VR
description: KungFu Town VR is a simulation KungFu game based on character AI and character skeleton creation. In the game you can attack on other people by fist, pick up weapons, AI characters can be crushed, cut, beheaded and so on.

name: Let's not stay friends
description: Friendship is a wonderful thing… unless you are friends with a girl who has no idea you have feelings for her! Inske, a student of magical arts, is troubled by the upcoming outdoors exam, and can't even imagine that someone might want to use the test as an opportunity to get close to her. Meanwhile, the number of applicants for her heart only increases… And while she’s busy figuring out her feelings, she still needs to survive and get a good grade!

name: Ropelike
description:
This game is a platformer with a storyline, in which you control the newcomer in a strange dungeon. 
The world is generated absolutely randomly and completely different every time.

name: Airport Madness 3D: Volume 2
description:
Our second volume of Airport Madness 3D compliments the first one with eight new airports, new aircraft, more gates, and sharper detail.

Volume Two offers New York John F. Kennedy, Toronto Pearson, Miami, London City, San Francisco, Lukla Nepal, Hong Kong, and Chicago O'Hare. An all-new career stats page lets you track your performance history across all eight airports.

name: Take the Cake
description: Take back Frank’s stolen cake from evil robots by navigating neon-lit worlds filled with puzzles, obstacles, and electronic music.

name: Christmas Race
description: Help Santa pick up presents on the trail! The more gifts you collect, the higher your score!

name: Voice Actress
description: Seiko is an ordinary and humble student, and at home, she is an online voice actress. Because of her father's work, Seiko's room also has good sound insulation equipment In the work of voice...

name: TurretMaster
description: An invading army that does not stop. One survivor that can turn coffee creamer into a flame thrower and junk metal into shells. Defend the land against ground and air threats and move up the ranks. Become a creator with the level editor and challenge friends from all over the world with your own visions of an impossible invasion.

name: Olympics VR
description: OlympicVR is a singleplayer/party game for HTC Vive. Get yourself in action and challenge friends in different disciplines to find out who will win. Three difficulty modes (easy, normal and extreme) will change the experience adding unique elements to the game.

name: BattleRush
description: Free-to-play multiplayer action game in the entourage of the Second World War with total destructibility of the environment. Enjoy full freedom, build a defense, create your army, crush the enemy.

name: Loot Run
description: Loot Run is a role-playing game featuring epic story, infinite skill builds, legendary loot, challenging bosses, endless and hardcore modes, 50 quests to complete, unique skins to unlock and more!

name: Mustache Politics Shooter
description: Play this awesome meme shooter and destroy fictional zombie politics who has ruined the world and safe all money

name: HeadSquare
description:
Multiplayer Ball Game. Single player mode supported. 

Use your head as the controller and play alone or with up to six players online. 
Very immersive multiplayer fun.

name: Cube Way
description: Cube Way is an easy to handle puzzle game with a minimalistic and incredibly beautiful environment.

name: Bystander
description:
Bystander is an opportunity to become an agent for tracking the network during totalitarianism.
Your task is to search among other people's correspondence on the network those that contradict the current laws, copies of which you will receive by fax.
Follow the new laws, look for the hidden meaning in each phrase and, of course, report violations, to the glory of the great Arstotska!

name: My Free Zoo
description: A small zoo needs your help! As the new manager, it's your job to boost business. Design the zoo of your dreams. From wolves and polar bears all the way to prehistoric beasts – the further you progress in the game, the more exotic the animals you'll be able to keep in your zoo. Play now and save the zoo!

name: Operation Apex
description: A virtual reality underwater adventure for the Vive in which you, a citizen scientist, take control of a research rig in order to learn about the current state of the oceans. As you begin to learn how to study the seas you are witness to one of the largest great white sharks ever seen. Moments later, your mission is clear - travel through the kelp, down the continental shelf and out in the open ocean to find and scan the mysterious shark.

name: It's Quiz Time
description: Go head to head with a brand new massive quiz game on PC! Featuring our devious AI game host Salli, take on It’s Quiz Time’s catalogue of over 25,000 questions. Face off against up to 8 players using your smartphone, go solo, or use Live Show mode to stream and play along with your audiences!

name: EverQuest II: Planes of Prophecy
description: The fourteenth expansion to EverQuest II.

name: DreadEye VR
description: Please, take a seat. You'll be here for a while. Don't worry, you won’t be alone. Let these creatures welcome you to give you a taste of a dark surreal experience. Don't be afraid just yet. Perhaps they will spare you this time around. After all, the nastiest thing they can do to you will only be virtual. But, then again You will probably be wishing you were in a real dream.

name: Star Ocean: The Last Hope - 4K & Full HD Remaster
description:
"From the creative minds of Square Enix and tri-Ace, STAR OCEAN: THE LAST HOPE takes place at the very beginning of the STAR OCEAN series. This action-packed RPG takes players on the epic journey of mankind’s last stand,with exploration and battle across some of the most mysterious, dangerous, and fantastical worlds of the universe.

Earth has been decimated by World War III, and now, humanity must turn to the stars in search of a new home. Explore the galaxy on your quest, make allies and enemies among the alien races you encounter, and uncover a danger so great that it threatens all of creation."

name: Village of Adventurers 2
description: This is a tactic RPG with Galgame element. The village you live in will be attacked by all kinds of monsters as the story expands. As the owner of the village, you'll need to recruit beautiful adventurers, use magic, build walls, turrets to defend it.

name: Cyborg Arena
description: You are one of the last survivor of a world ruled by cyborgs ! Fight and resist the cyberpunk androids through a single player horror adventure with destructible environments and various game modes !

name: Black Mirror
description:
Blood is not always thicker than water.

Scotland, 1926. Following the suicide of his father, David Gordon visits his ancestral home for the first time in his life. A life that is soon threatened by the dark secrets that claimed the sanity of many Gordons before him.

Tormented by nightmares and waking dreams for all his life, David fears that it might be his destiny to follow in his father’s footsteps, down a path that leads to madness, and death.

Is there really a Curse that has been haunting his family, like his father believed?
It is up to David to uncover the horrible truths, buried under generations of silence and fathoms of stone. Black Mirror Castle demands an offering...

"I became insane, with long intervals of horrible sanity."
Edgar Allen Poe

Like in the original graphic adventure trilogy, the Gothic Horror genre and its unique atmosphere of madness and psychological distress remains at the heart of Black Mirror.
The point-and-click gameplay of the original trilogy served as the basis for the re-imagined gameplay, which focuses on close-up investigation and interaction with nightmarish visions that plague the protagonist of the game David Gordon.

"They who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night."
Edgar Allan Poe

Gameplay
Like in the original graphic adventure trilogy, the Gothic Horror genre and its unique atmosphere of madness and psychological distress remains at the heart of Black Mirror.
The point-and-click gameplay of the original trilogy served as the basis for the re-imagined gameplay, which focuses on close-up investigation and interaction with nightmarish visions that plague the protagonist of the game David Gordon.

Key Features
• A modern re-imagining of the acclaimed gothic-horror adventure series
• Interactions with vision-like apparitions which help you learn more about the past of your family
• Eerie atmosphere focusing on the horrors of the mind, in the style of EA Poe and HP Lovecraft
• High quality voice acting from a compelling ensemble cast

name: Resident Evil Revelations Collection
description: A bundle containing Resident Evil Revelations on a game card and download codes for the Resident Evil Revelations 2 episodes. Includes all previously released DLC for the games.

name: Genius Quiz Rick&M
description: Genius Quiz Rick&M is an unofficial-themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with fifty questions to test your knowledge of the Rick and Morty series.

name: Haunted Hour
description: Haunted Hour Augmented Reality game will turn your home into a haunted house with creepy atmosphere. You will play as a ghost hunter with a ghost detector device that will detect paranormal activity and notify when you are too close from the spirit. you may sense some mystical powers hidden at your home.

name: People's Chess
description:
Summon entire armies in augmented reality!
People’s chess is the craziest and funniest chess game ever ! Summon entire armies in your living room and use military leaders with cooking pan over the head to march to victory !
Funny characters, vibrant sound effects, military cooking pans and powerful nukes at your finger tip make this smart game great again!
People’s Chess is a full AR experience: you can play with a friend on one single device or improve your chess skills by playing against the computer!
And don’t forget : new armies and leaders are regularly joining the People’s chess’ gang! So make room for the funniest AR game available !

name: Tapping Skill Test
description: Sin descripción

name: World on Fire
description:
"In the fight for power and glory, a global war between opposing armies is ongoing with no end in sight. 
 
With debris falling and fire blazing across the skies, a crumbling world has been left in utter ruins. But the war has only just begun. 
 
Ruined bases to be rebuilt! Armies are waiting for your command! Lost territories to be recovered! 
 
Form alliances with other united commanders from around the world. Research new technologies. Destroy the rebels. Exterminate your enemies. Become the new leader of the world, and lead a new era. 
 
There is no eternal rival, only personal glory. Test your wits in war and strategy to stifle your enemies."

name: Sniper Strike: Special Ops
description:
Intercept, eliminate and extract. It’s time to engage the enemy.

Sniper Strike is a high-octane sniper experience that pits you in battle across three gameplay modes and hundreds of missions. Experience a AAA rated sniper game like never before on mobile.

Scout through immersive environments, engage in rapid-fire combat and build the ultimate super-soldier as you customise their state of the art gear.
Team up with Wolf, Jackson and the rest of Strike Force as you target hostiles and take down the evil Elite Order. Go head to head with friends in online combat and shoot to the top of the leaderboard.

● Wipe out Elite Commanders and their henchmen with satisfying kill shots!

● Buddy up with allies to cover Delta Team and rescue hostages.

● Seek out online friends (and foes) and challenge them to LIVE sniper duels!

● Join forces with Clan friends to smash missions, and prepare for the ultimate showdown with the Elite Order.

● The more you win, the better you play – upgrade and engage in harder, faster challenges that will send you flying up the leaderboard!

Whether you're engaged in live PvP sniper duels, rescuing hostages with breach specialist Wolf, or fighting to be the last man standing in arena mode, this is one epic FPS experience that you don't want to miss!

name: Mad Teacher
description: Mad Teacher is an IOS game release in 2017.

developers.name: Baby Education Animal Weather Toys LTD.

name: Go Plane
description:
Let the missiles approach without touching you and dodge as many as possible to win points!

-Easy to grasp
-Hard to master
-Greatly Addictive

name: Keen Commander World
description: Keen Commander World is a remix of Commander Keen: Marooned On Mars (Shareware) into a Super Mario Brothers 3 style platformer!

name: Dominions 5: Warriors of the Faith
description: A turn based strategy game.

name: Argentum Age
description: An open source digital collectible card game with tactical positioning, and a focus on limited randomness to allow for maximum player skill.

name: Desert Bus VR
description: "Desert Bus is back and better than ever! The 1998 Penn and Teller cult hit mini-game is coming to virtual reality, so you can fully immerse yourself in the thrilling eight-hour trip from Arizona to Nevada. It’s almost like you’re driving the “wheel” thing!"

name: Ode
description:
"Ode is an immersive, enchanting visual & musical experience through beautiful open worlds. Spread joy as you explore each sensory level, bringing the world to life by collecting and releasing fallen stars to create a harmonious musical garden full of colour and wonder."

"Ode IS UNLIKE ANY GAME YOU’VE PLAYED!
Unlike most traditional games, ode is an experiential journey through music and light. With no HUD to guide you, no tutorial and no hints, ode allows you to explore the sensory worlds around you at your own pace and direction. Your only goal is to spread joy throughout the world!
- Complete freedom to explore fantasy landscapes
- Everything in the world reacts to you
- Bring each world to life through light, sound and colour"

name: Eternal Hour: Golden Hour
description:
Play through a timeless adventure as Yasu or Rin Fujimoto and discover the origins of Eternal Hour!

Eternal Hour: Golden Hour is a fun, emotional, and story-driven Visual Novel that takes place before the events of Eternal Hour.

name: Saint Seiya: Cosmo Fantasy
description: Sin descripción

name: CarCollector
description: "Car Collector" is a Reaction-Time game that will test your reflexes, you must collect cars as they travel across the screen. Collecting cars gives you money to unlock new ones giving you access to new levels. Cars will be crossing the screen rapidly and you must collect them. You lose life if you click on cars that have not yet been activated OR by letting cars that you own escape.

name: Dominions 5
description:
In Dominions 5 you take control of a powerful being that rules a nation and aspires to godhood. The type of Pretender Gods can vary from magically powerful arch mages to huge titans or large monuments. 
Dominions is a deep 4x turn based strategy game with a very large variety of spells and units.

name: Box Looter 2018
description: A dumb joke game in which loot boxes are the loot. Poke fun at loot boxes while poking at loot boxes. Climb the mountain and find the loot box of unknown riches that the prophecy foretold! The 2,018th game in the wildly popular Box Looter series.

name: Top Secret
description: Top Secret is an intense 10 minute interactive VR narrative. It combines situational problem-solving with action-based gameplay. Have you ever wanted to have psychic powers like telekinesis? Now you can!

name: The Promethium Effect
description:
Your job as head of the corporation is to take on the role of manager, pirate, and bounty hunter. All for the growth of the corporation. 

Protect your assets, steal from the weak, post bounties and pay others to do your dirty work to get ahead.

name: Journey to Luonto
description: A RPG game that involves killing monsters, bosses, and completing the main quest line

name: Brainy Joy
description: in a fantasy universe, the player have to kill all the static demons and avoid or kill sorcerers in a network to take goodies in order to kill the static demons.

name: Boinks
description:
Populate the screen with the happy Boinks. Avoid the nasty bouncies. Fill enough of the screen to progress to the next level. 
Use your mouse to inflate the Boinks and remember to drop them before they are hit by any nasties, or you'll have to start again. Watch out for the timer and you have a limited number of Boinks per level so make the most of them.

name: Dream Channel
description: Dream Channel is a 'choose your own adventure' VR series about gangsters who buy and sell dreams on the black market. Players enter a VR world (The Dream Channel) and soon discover that their dreams have been stolen too! The starting sector for the story is the DJ sector where DJs play sets from the virtual night clubs - seamlessly monetised using Gaze Coin.

name: The Silence Outside
description: The Silence Outside is a First Person Stealth Mystery game set on a space station in the near future. You play a freshly hired maintenance engineer thrust into the middle of a catastrophic power failure and caught between the competing interests of those on board. The game features an extensive Challenge Mode which changes up the setting for new and interesting gameplay opportunities.

name: Paintboss - Car Painting VR
description: Can you make it as a painter? Put your skills to the test and let your creativity flow inside this paint booth simulator. Featuring realistic spray gun behavior that simulates a real world spraying pattern. Choose from multiple vehicles, including a plane. You can choose from either a paint gun, airbrush, or aerosol spray type, with the simplified controls you only require one controller.

name: Psi Project: Legacy
description: Psi Project Legacy - is a new part of the hardcore 2D shooter with elements of horror. It all starts again. You have to go back to the very unfortunate complex to endure the horror.

name: Tank Wars: Anniversary Edition
description: In Tank Wars: Anniversary Edition, a player has to control a (stationary) artillery tank in order to take down opponents with ballistic shots from a selection of different weapons. We paired old school, pixelated, low-resolution 2D graphics with some modern-ish concepts and effects.

name: Super Turbo Demon Busters!
description: STDB! is a rogue-like game about space marines escaping from a planet filled with monsters, nuclear fire, viruses and ironic humor.

name: Eternal Empires
description: Eternal Empires is a real-time strategy game, player has to simultaneously manage economy, military and diplomacy.

name: Odysseus Kosmos and his Robot Quest
description: A classic COMEDY QUEST about being geeky and procrastinative in SPACE!

name: Purple Heart
description: A military combat game for Commodore 64.

name: MP2: Christmas Outpost
description: Sin descripción

name: MP2: Frostbite Ruins
description: Sin descripción

name: Big Ice Tower Tiny Square
description: Sin descripción

name: Fantasy Clicker of Cute Cocoa
description: Fantasy Clicker of Cute Cocoa is a mini-game like a small candy for players to elevate their mood.

name: Minimalist
description: A short game about objects, our attachments to them, and the feeling of being burdened by them.

name: Shin Hayarigami: Blindman
description: A mobile port of Shin Hayarigami's first case.

name: Adj
description:
Don't have any card games to play with your friends? Need an icebreaker over a phone conversation? Try and play Adj! It's free and no installation nor registration required! :) 
 
Your friends try to guess your chosen card, while you describe it using only adjectives, and AND and OR! No other words allowed! Say... "big AND dark", "sour OR sweet, AND round, AND green"!

name: Intergalactic traveler: The Omega Sector
description: A game about solving labyrinths with puzzles and battles in order to test your skills.

name: Flight of a Dragon
description: A platformer for the Uzebox.

name: Crescent Prism
description: Crescent Prism is a story-driven RPG that follows the story of Lunita, a young girl from the bustling hamlet of Merryday Village.

name: Make Me Real
description: The Ensurer watches over all.

name: Colorzzle
description: 'Colorzzle' is an easy and relaxing puzzle game. When you match the colors, the trees grow and flowers bloom. Grow up every plants to clear the stage. You can start easily, but it will become more and more difficult as you proceed.

name: C64 & Amiga Classix Remakes Sixpack 2
description: Get some of the classic games from the 80s and 90s back on your home PC - as a remake.

name: Target speed
description: Endless first-person race, dodge obstacles and improve your record.

name: Contradiction
description:
Contradiction is an retro-style action indie-game. 
It is completely free, with no hidden fees. 
The gameplay is targeted for experienced players.

name: Piggy Poggy Pog
description: Piggy Poggy Pog - is quite a complex, nice-looking 2D platformer in which you must escape from the farm playing for a pig named Poggy . In this game you go through the levels, collecting a certain number of acorns.

name: Chopper Battle New Horizon
description: Escape your opponents with avidly daring maneuvers and become a hunter, who knows no mercy! Embark on a mission that requires all your flying skills!

name: Virtual Reality Girls
description: If you ever dreamed of passionate and sensual private dance show, performed by hot girl, Virtual Reality Girls is right for you! Step in this intimate world and let your imagination go wild!

name: The Under
description: In a place unknown to the living, a young boy must navigate The Under so he may return to the world above.

name: Harvest Simulator VR
description: Forget about those farming experiences on social media. Cultivating, plowing, planting, harvesting crops, buying seeds and tending to animals including those pesky chickens has never been so interactive and fun!

name: Unforgiving - A Northern Hymn
description:
All the stories being told to scare children is actually true. The Swedish folklore is real and it's coming for you!
This first person horror game is heavily inspired by Swedish folklore and the Nordic mythology to create the nightmares that's been haunting Swedish children for many generations.

name: MP2: Damp Jungle
description: Sin descripción

name: Metro
description: A digital implementation of the board game about building the Paris Métro.

name: Splatoon 2: Version 2.0.0
description:
Version 2.0.0 of Splatoon 2.

Major content update:
31 new headgear items, 68 new clothing items, and 41 new pairs of shoes.
Two new hairstyles and two new legwear options for each gender.
Five new music tracks.
New Salmon Run stage: Salmonid Smokeyard.
Four other new stages were added in the update to be unlocked at a later date.
Enhanced amiibo photography feature.
New level cap.
New Crust Bucket menu items.
UI enhancements.
Adjustments and bug fixes for multiplayer and Salmon Run.
Balance adjustments for main weapons, sub weapons, and special weapons.

name: Tetsudou Nippon! Rosen Tabi: Aizu Tetsudou‑hen
description:
A train simulation game from Sonic Powered's "Japanese Rail Sim" series. This title is exclusive to Japan, and was the last game in the series released for the Nintendo 3DS.
In this entry, you can operate the Aizu Railway's "AT-700" and "AT-100" train models through a 57.4 km trip from Nishiwakamatsu Station to Aizu Kogen Ozeguchi Station, on Aizu Railway's Aizu Line.

name: The Zium Museum
description:
zium / noun / informal:
1. a virtual gallery game, composed of eclectic and wonderful things.
2. (kind of like a zine, but the museum version)

Welcome to The Zium Museum (The 2017 Creative Collection)

The Zium Museum is a Museum Exploration Game
filled with artwork and installations from over 30 artist
from around the world.

name: Starry Makino
description: The universe is full of unknown and magical for mankind. At present, our understanding of the gorgeous universe is mainly derived from the study of the invisible universe, the vast sky, the mysterious constellation, the beautiful aurora phenomenon, all show the infinite charm of the universe.

name: Talk To Me
description: Talk to Me is a Western-style Visual Novel about grief, mental health and friendship. Explore up to 20 different outcomes of the game and seee how your choices have affected the main character Ordell’s life.

name: Lines Infinite
description: Lines Infinite is a Numberlink-based puzzle game involving finding paths to connect colored tiles in a grid.

name: Dark Hill Museum of Death
description:
Welcome to Dark Hill Museum of Death! 
 
Explore exhibits on execution, burial & cremation, human sacrifice, and festivals of the dead in this morbid museum. Solve puzzles along the way to unlock the secret of the final exhibit.

name: Find someone else
description: A visual novel about the ever-changing nature of relationships and the hardships of dealing with loss.

name: Metro - The Board Game
description:
Paris, 1898: Preperation for the World’s Fair “1900” are in full swing throughout the city.

Everywhere scaffoldings are being erected. Tunnels are constructed on the streets to be sunken later.The construction of the Paris Metro system is underway! 

But who will build the longest Metro line?

Test your skills against 7 different AI characters from easy to super hard!

Play online against friends!

Will you be able to gain all achievements?

name: Tabikaeru
description: A mobile game about a frog who goes on various trips to distant places, sending postcards during their journey and bringing back souvenirs.

name: Granny
description:
Welcome to Granny.

Granny keeps you locked in her house.
Now you have to try to get out of her house, but be careful and quiet. She hears everything.
If you drop something on the floor, she hears it and comes running.
You can hide in wardrobes or under beds.
You have 5 days.

Good luck!

The game contains advertisement.

name: 3-in-1 Bundle Brain Trainings
description: We transform science into delightful games.For decades, researchers have created tasks that measure cognitive abilities. We’ve adapted some of these tasks and made some of our own, creating cognitive games. It makes you smarter!

name: tinyBuild Action-Packed Bundle
description:
BANG BOOM POW!!! Cut to the chase, it's leaping on speeding trucks in Clustertruck, it's punching through organized crime in Mr. Shifty, it's drop-kicking crocodiles in Punch Club- this is tinyBuild's most action-packed bundle yet!

This bundle is not only ClusterTruck's 100+ levels of jetpacking, grappling-hooking, truck-flipping mayhem, it's also teleporting through walls and through bullets to punch armed guards through windows in Mr.Shifty. PLUS you'll be training to rise through the ranks of an underground fight league in Punch Club. Catch up on all of tinyBuild's biggest releases in one place!

name: Znkl: 177
description: You are a pilot of the spaceship "Znkl: 177". You need to deliver a capsule with important information to the cargo spaceship.

name: Making Lovers
description: A visual novel from Smee.

name: Titanic VR
description: Diving to the bottom of the North Atlantic, you take on the role of Dr. Ethan Lynch, Associate Professor of Maritime Archaeology. With funding from a mysterious investor you set out to answer questions that have remained submerged for a century.

name: Darkest Wave
description: In the future retro of 3180, The government has created a program of self aware mechanized creatures and they have gone rouge. The story begins as Max Titan gets the call that he has to bail the world out yet again, Max pilots his custom Fighter car the X-50 to destroy the sentient bosses of this growing army of mechanized animals and insects. Fly with Max through 5 levels of explosive color and sound. Full 60 fps shoot-em up madness, enemy waves designed on beats per minute! Included Darkest Wave OST courtesy of Shaft Records.

name: Archamon
description:
Archamon is a realtime creative/building/survival strategy game from medieval times.
You must build villages and you have to acquire food for your people and raw materials. Expand and rise your nation, create an aristocratic family and achieve higher nobility titles.
You can prosper in spite of starvation, illness, bad weather, cold and in spite of all the enemies ...

name: Jam Session VR
description: Enter a musical world! Jam Session VR let's you create huge musical monstrosities with your Oculus Touch or Steam VR controllers!

name: Achievement Lurker: Dad Jokes
description:
Join Jordy, the #1 Dad on his quest to be the best dad in the land. Jordy the #1 Dad roams the vast landscape and meets interesting friends like Mihailovich & Sergej. Jordy the #1 Dad is fueled by pride and arousal, in his quest to learn all the Dad jokes in the world. Do you have what it takes to become the #1 Dad? 
 
5000 Steam Achievements

name: Trigonometry
description: Trigonometry is a fun casual game, ​The rotating triangle in Trigonometry is the pivoting center of this exciting action game! Match colors to go further and try to beat your own score!

name: Spinning Around
description: Are you up for the challenge? Spinning around is an arcade game that will test your reflexes in the simplest form. Guide your spaceship through the gates,be fast!

name: Offensive Dimensions
description:
Offensive Dimensions is a hardcore, dark themed, retro 2d action game. Currently is in early access phase. 
The demo version is available for downloading. Please try that first. Also, the content of the demo version is identical to the paid version, for now. 
I'll keep updating the Early Access version in the future and the demo version won't be updated anymore. If you tried the demo version and liked my game, then you can consider purchasing my game.

name: Wronged
description:
Wronged combines adventure-puzzle gameplay and a low-poly, pixellated art style with an oppressively dark horror atmosphere. Use only household items and your own wits to escape a warped, claustrophobic nightmare world shrouded in darkness.
It is in your house now.

name: Darkroom 2
description:
Darkroom 2 is a sequel of Darkroom. You managed to figure out where you are, and now you have to find out what to do next.
Do you want to know the end of Timmy’s story?

name: Blood Waves
description: Hardcore and bloody shooter where you will have to repulse the attacks of the living dead using the destroying traps, defensive barricades and also weapon of close and long-range combat.

name: Sea Battle VR
description:
This game bring the player back into the Age of Wind that happened in 15th century to 16th century. 
Our Developer takes every advantage of modern Virtual Reality Technology to offer player a real adventure. 
, 1:1 recreated 15-16th century’s warships into a realistic world. 
Players will cooperated together to fight other players’ group all over the real world. 
Remember! solidarity and cooperation is the only way you can survive in our game. 
Our game offered player the simplest operating method, realistic art, unique playing strategy and PVP matching.

name: Immortal Heroes
description:
You are a brave warrior who came to this world to save its inhabitants. 
Here you will be met by awful monsters, such as huge spiders, wolf-werewolves, bears, unicorns ... 
The essence of the game, like any clicker, is to quickly press the button to the finish.

name: Djilyaro
description: Djilyaro is a short, first-person psychedelic game. In a strange place you awake with one goal, to find all the pieces and to be set free of this strange island. Although the closer you get to completion the stranger things become.

name: SoM Soul of Mask
description: Soul of Mask (SoM) is a labyrinth game where the spirit tries to collect Demon eyes to leave the underworld. Controllers: Touch Screen, Keyboard, Joystick.

name: Depopulation
description: The world’s pollution is threatening all life on Earth. Employed by a Billionaire, and chosen for your high intelligence and psychopathic tendencies, it’s up to you to save the world by any means necessary. On surface Depopulation is a military strategy game glorifying casualties, but underneath is a deeply emotional, philosophical rollercoaster, that will help you understand our unbreakable connection with the environment. It hopes to portray the terrible cost of ignoring that connection.

name: Houston, We Have Spinach!
description: Design and build rockets, fuel them with food and explore a galaxy filled with strange planets.

name: Space Panic Defense
description: A futuristic tower defense game with action and strategy!

name: Around the World in 80 days
description: You will travel round the world with the Jules Verne heroes! Each location (scene) is a new continent or a new country where you will find yourself in the atmosphere of this region thanks to the picturesque and colorful graphics and the unique musical background.

name: Snake: Road to apple
description: Snake: Road to Apple snake is a nice classic game. Eating apples, earn points. Earn a maximum of points!

name: Yi and the Thousand Moons
description: A short video game musical.

name: Deathlands
description: Deathlands is a multiplayer turn-based survival game where you fight other players to remain the last man standing. If you only play one turn-based game, make it this one, because you'll love it!

name: Amiga Classix 3
description: Get some of the classic games from the 80s and 90s back on your home PC - as a remake.

name: Senran Kagura Reflexions
description: Can you feel it? The beating of her heart... In a classroom after school, learn the ways of "reflexology" by syncing with her heart and body. In SENRAN KAGURA Reflexions, interact with your favorite shinobi heroine like never before.

name: Heads Off
description: Heads Off is a rather strange two dimensional arcade platformer, in which your character is a disembodied head that moves through the levels by yelling. Your objective? Go as far as you can through dangerous levels full of cliffs and other obstacles.

name: Tamagotchi mix: Anniversary Gift mix ver.
description: Tamagotchi m!x Anniversary Gift m!x version is a special version of the Tamagotchi m!x released in a gift set, this features all of the same locations as the 20th Anniversary version, but also includes exclusive access to Present Island and its characters.

name: VRC Pro: Off-Road Track - Buggyland Fuencarral, Spain
description: Outdoor off-road track: Buggyland Fuencarral, Spain was the host track for the 2017 VRC off-road Worlds: Buggyland Fuencarral Spain. This is the 2014 version of this track, the track has received several other layouts since, but the 2014 lay-out was certainly one of the most popular.

name: Complex Doom
description: Complex Doom (formely known as Replacements) is a WAD for Zandronum by Daedalus. It features redone weapons, enemies, powerups, sounds and graphics.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild - Collector's Edition
description: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild is the first 3D open-world game in the Zelda series. Link can travel anywhere and be equipped with weapons and armor found throughout the world to grant him various bonuses. Unlike many games in the series, Breath of the Wild does not impose a specific order in which quests or dungeons must be completed. While the game still has environmental obstacles such as weather effects, inhospitable lands, or powerful enemies, many of them can be overcome using the right method. A lot of critics ranked Breath of the Wild as one of the best video games of all time.

name: LEGO Friends Heartlake Rush
description: Race through Heartlake City in this free LEGO racing game! Have fun with Olivia on the race track or download the app for the full play experience.

name: Beyblade: Burst God
description: Beyblade Burst God is an Action game, developed and published by FuRyu, which was released in Japan in 2017.

name: Prey with Gun
description: Under command of a young boy to complete his plan and dig out the hidden truth and his motivation. (The English Version of this game will release soon)

name: Rugby Nations 18
description: Featuring more teams than ever before, vastly expanded career mode, improved graphics and full directional control of your players via the on-screen d-pad, this is the best Rugby Nations yet.

name: Reflex
description: A simple puzzle game. Simple graphics and nice music. Try your mind in more than 70+ levels. They are waiting for you.

name: 4-in-1 IQ Scale Bundle
description: We transform science into delightful gamesFor decades, researchers have created tasks that measure cognitive abilities. We’ve adapted some of these tasks and made some of our own, creating cognitive games. It makes you smarter!

name: Reformers
description: Reformers is a retro Role-Playing Game. There's no guide in the game, but plenty pleasures that waiting your exploration and discovery.

name: Bunny Mania 2
description:
Bunny Mania around the world! 
 
Command lots of bunnies, and help them to reach the bunny house. Build bridges, drill holes, and collect vegetables 
 
Key features: 
- 4 game worlds, 60 levels 
- 10 tools, powerups and crates 
- elevators and traps 
- advanced hint system

name: Tropia
description:
Follow four heroes, a wizard, paladin, brawler, and ranger, on their adventure. It's 5+ hours of solid turn based monster slaying, macguffin collecting, and princess saving fun. 
 
This is an old school NES style RPG. It's called Tropia for a reason. We're not trying to make anything revolutionary. If you find yourself thinking, "I'd love to play a game that's a lot like the original Dragon Quest or Final Fantasy games, but I already beat those games", then this is the game for you.

name: Mille Bornes
description: Rediscover the original French racing card game in this digital adaptation! Trust your steering wheel, and be the first of your friends to reach the finish line! But be careful: a flat tire, an accident, or an empty gas tank could be lurking at every turn!

name: Amon
description:
Follow Amon, the God of Air, on his quest to connect a world of puzzling optical illusions using Virtual Reality.
Look around, move around and play around with ancient 3D scanned sculptures from museums around the world.
Be sure to put your headphones on when putting together the historic pieces, as Amon is built with Binaural Audio to help you solve the puzzles.
It will be an epic journey that moves you. Literally.

name: Joumee the Hedgehog
description:
Meet Joumee!
Joumee is cute little hedgehog who lives in a beautiful park located in the centre of the City. Having noticed more and more trees being cut down in his home park and more areas to be taken down by the City - he decides to go out and find out what's going on!

name: Battleship Lonewolf
description: Lone Wolf is a game to become a captain of the space warship “Lone Wolf" where in a space battle opera. You will fall into the charm of a gun that emits a powerful firepower toward the enemies, and you will be attracted by the various charms of the space warship “Lone Wolf”.

name: Plans for NY?
description: This story is telling you about young girl Kathryn and her New Year's unexpectable sex adventures.

name: Now Man Flies
description: Travel on an intergalactic highway in search of new planets! In this game you have to explore new lands, flying from one planet to another. Avoid spaceships, destroy enemies, complete missions and get achievements!

name: Be the Hero
description:
Be the Hero is a VR single play action game in which the player becomes a hero to save the city from the enemies.
You can become the hero who everyone used to dreamed of.

name: Yanone: Letter Splatter
description: Yanone immerses you in a quirky environment where the fast-paced action requires you to be on your guard at all times.

name: Yissa Deep Realms
description: Hardcore action platformer with multiple endings that depend on your choices.

name: Vector Velocity
description: In Vector Velocity movement is the name of the game. Run, Jump, Slide, Climb, Grind, Skid, Zipline and ultimately race your way from point A to B as fast as you can.

name: Silent space VR
description: Silent space VR - Sci/Fi shooting game in virtual reality developed by BCH waves game studio. We want to provide players from all over the world with an immersive VR interactive experience.

name: Tevris
description:
Classic tetromino game in VR. 
One of the most awaited puzzle classics to be played with motion controls. 
Cute blocks, vivid colors, high scores, MEGA-mode and more to come.

name: Alpha Locus VR
description: Alpha Locus VR is a horror wave based shooter for the HTC Vive (PC). You can fight through various waves using both melee weapons and guns. As an immersive shooter, this game is scary and fun.

name: Integrity
description: Integrity is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game in which players interact in a world of absolute freedom. You can be a criminal, businessman, police officer or anything inbetween.

name: Soul of Mask
description:
Soul of Mask (SoM) is a labyrinth game where the spirit tries to collect Demon eyes to leave the underworld.

Player can buy 5 different masks with game coins to use powers of the mask as weapon to attack, hide or teleport.
More than 100 levels are available with the range of difficulty from casual to very hardcore.
Select your path well or die and retry to know the best way to pass a level. Many surprises and unexpected enemies are waiting for you at every corner.
Not everything which looks easy will prove to be so. Get your brain working at its best!

Controllers: Touch Screen, Keyboard, Joystick.

name: Fariwalk: The Prelude
description: The world where humanity is almost gone. A few remaining people search for each other amongst monsters, common inhabitants of the Earth. However, this story is about a child who is going to obtain something very important. Fariwalk: The Prelude is a short prologue to The Fariwalk game. This horror adventure will introduce you to the sad, withering world of the game.

name: UnderHuman
description: UnderHuman is a physics based Roguelite Platformer RPG. Act as human boy Carl to fight through Capitol island, mutate your body with animal power and utilize 300+ props and abilities. Find the reason why Beast Plague is rampant among the land.

name: The Sky House
description: Sin descripción

name: Payday 2: Crimewave Edition - Scarface Heist
description: The Scarface Heist Pack comes with The Scarface Mansion Heist, 1 new weapon, 1 melee weapon, 4 masks, materials and patterns and 4 Achievements.

name: Zaccaria Pinball: Hot Wheels 2017 Table
description: Hot Wheels 2017 Table is a modernized version of the original Hot Wheels table from 1979.

name: Path: Through the Forest
description:
In this puzzle game you controll a girl by taping on the blocks you want her to move on and have to collect all gems and get to the gate to finish a level.
Levels are organized in five times of day, each with there own unique mechanic.

name: ZombieVital DG
description: ZombieVital DG is a comprehensive management game where you become the lord of a dungeon and decide the placement of monsters, traps, and items.

name: Hatsune Miku: Project Diva Future Tone DX
description:
Hatsune Miku: Project Diva Future Tone DX is a packaged release that includes
Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA Future Tone Prelude,
Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA Future Tone Future Sound,
Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA Future Tone Colorful Tone,
“1st Encore Pack,” “2nd Encore Pack, and “3rd Encore Pack” add-ons are also included.

Additionally, to commemorate the release of the physical version, we’re adding the song “Ghost Rule,” which has achieved over 9.5 million views on video upload websites. In total, Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA Future Tone DX includes 237 songs and 396 modules (costumes).

name: The Inner World 2
description: Solve mind-bending puzzles in a world full of mystery and save the family of the flute-noses! Their dynasty has been watching over Asposia for centuries on end. In secret, they fill the roly-poly world with light and life. But when their existence is discovered, they become hunted.

name: Amenity's Life
description:
Anthropomorphism × Anthropomorphization Personification Everyday with a beautiful girl

A slapstick story that begins with becoming girls thing.
Various things such as smartphone, headphones, robot vacuum cleaner etc which cant usually leave became girls and suddenly became a harem state!What?
Appealing to try using yourself, common sense does not pass in the first place, childhood and adult older sister of small size, etc are also various!
Suddenly enjoy enjoying the butterfly life with heroines and things thrown into extraordinary daily life.

Straight love...
This love affair with the heroines is a direct ball game. From sticking to love patterns among parties on a one-to-one basis, from conflicting feelings to each other, even expressions that only confesses to a lover after a relationship, there is embarrassing empathy that can be shown as a straightforward romance and a straight game deliver happiness.

name: Aceonline: DuelX
description:
Super Exciting Battle! Stylish Action!
The start of an exciting new adventure for the best Pilots!
Sortie, complete! Boosters, ON!
DuelX, the 3D space combat action game.
Become your own awesome fighter jet (gear) Pilot and experience showy flying action throughout the galaxies.

name: Mille Bornes
description:
Hop in your car and hit the road! The goal in this classic card game is simple: be the first to reach 1000 miles! Play with up to three friends on the same device, or test your driving skill against the AI! Who will be the best behind the wheel?
Draw cards and use them to jump miles ahead of your opponents. But you also have to be careful, because your friends may well not just let you drive in peace: flat tires, accidents or simply running out of gas are some of the complications you might encounter on your journey.

name: Puzzle Game Blast
description:
Block Puzzle Game is a challenging puzzle game with a simple gameplay.

Drag shapes to fill in the blank. A row or column full of blocks will be eliminated, and you will get some score.
Game will be over if there are no space for any the given blocks below the board.

No time limit! A fun and relaxing puzzle game.

I trust you will love it, download now!

name: World War Heroes
description:
Fight soldiers from all over the world in the best World War II online shooter for iOS!
This game will take you to World War II battlefields, where you’ll able to use military vehicles to conduct battles.

name: Talking Tom Pool
description: Get ready to party with Talking Tom and Friends in a completely new kind of puzzle game! Sling and match colors to clear the pool and win!

name: Santa's vacation
description:
Collect New Year's toys and gifts, fight off your opponents and outstrip them. Compare the results with other players. It’s fun!
Win and become Super-Crazy-Santa!

name: Hell Space
description: This is the 360 degrees indie slasher with the top view and old school graphics.

name: Broadway: 1849
description: Fight your way to box office glory, while fending off the gangs of New York! Will you spur a revolution or keep order in a fractious city?

name: ACA Neo Geo: Soccer Brawl
description: Soccer Brawl is a soccer game released by SNK in 1992. Sparks fly as teams representing 8 different countries battle for the championship. Staged in the near future, teams feature 7 robot player instead of the normal 11 players, allowing the defense to also go on the attack and for a variety of arrangements."

name: Awe of Despair
description: Awe of Despair is a survival horror game which puts you in the shoes of a man who decides to ignore the stigma of the number 13. The goal of this game is to provide the player with a deeply immersive horror experience. You will run into disturbing creatures, discover new weapons, and solve puzzles as you battle your way out of this parallel world.

name: Station 228
description: Help the guard Ramses get out of this damn station. You need to go home to your family. Your awaits an incredible journey.

name: Chocolate makes you happy
description: Casual colorful physical puzzle with sweets and explosions.

name: The Mammoth: A Cave Painting
description: Tell the 5 million year story of the mammoth in 5 minutes.

name: Flow Handcrafted
description: Flow is an elegant puzzle game with minimal graphics and challenging levels.

name: Cube Color
description: "Cube Color" - a game in which you need to repaint more territory in the color of your cube. Compete against computer or friends who will take over the earth.

name: Keep in touch
description: This is a story about a young hot girl Melanie. One day she goes shopping. Speaking on the phone in the dressing room, she will start share her sexual fantasies with her girlfriend.

name: Escape Camp Waddalooh
description:
Falkrus® invites you to experience the thrill of immersive VR at camp Waddalooh. 
Keep your wits about you as you explore camp for an escape with nothing but a flashlight.

name: Orblitz
description: Orblitz is a casual game that is great for winding down or just passing time.

name: Bakery
description:
The initial release was released in 2002. 2017 re-launch in steam 
----------------------------------------------------- 
* The new style of business games, allowing you to experience the thick style of European-style bakery. 
* Delicate screen + delicate character movements and modeling. 
* RPG animation comparable to RPG-like exquisite plot.

name: Grandpa and the Zombies
description: Just after waking up in a hospital, Grandpa Willy quickly realizes that there’s something fishy going on and that the world has changed. There’s no time to ask questions though since the zombies are already pounding on the door.

name: Eseapner
description: Psychological thriller, where SHE holds power over you. A lot of victims died here. She made them her slaves to become stronger and more bloodthirsty. Can you resist it in the struggle for survival?

name: Thundering Skies
description: A shoot'em up inspired by the 16-bit classics of the genre.

name: Codename: Phantom
description: Step into the shoes of an elite agent and experience thrilling scenarios filled with tension.

name: Zombie Bloxx
description: Do whatever you can to survive this zombie filled nightmare! You’ll face an unending horde of block hungry zombies, ready to pull you apart pixel by pixel. Don’t scream yet though, there's a wide array of unlockable weapons and helpful environments to take them down.

name: Haque
description: Haque is a glitch fantasy roguelike adventure about cute monsters, low-bit hauntings, and a suspiciously talkative narrator. Choose your character and battle through forests, deserts and dungeons to defeat a mysterious evil. Die often. Try again!

name: John the Zombie
description: So you might be wondering: am I really gonna put zombie to ride a horse while running from an armored car in a partially destroyed city that I put in this chaotic state myself? Oh, yes you are! Have all the fun you want while terrorizing everyone around you and eating a massive load of brains!

name: Tratel64
description: Prepare for an experience unlike anything you've seen before... Tratel64 is a comedy game that's stylized like a fever dream! Watch Tratel go from 0 to 64 over the course of an afternoon (in real time that amounts to 2-3 hours).

name: Terrorist Elimination
description: Terrorist Elimination is a hardcore fps. Buy guns and ammo in the store, use them to kill terrorist.

name: War Brokers
description: A Browser based multiplayer game where players can fight it out on foot, in APC's, tanks, or helicopters in large scale maps.

name: Tales of Winds: Tomb of the Sol Empire
description: 冒険者業を生業とする家族が向かったのは古代の遺跡。一行はそこで歴史に埋もれた大国の謎に触れる。拠点となる街の人達と関わりながら遺跡を探索し、さまよう幽霊や魔物を相手に最奥を目指そう！豪華声優陣によるパートボイスも注目の探索RPG。

name: Going Nowhere: The Dream
description: Loren's on a journey through an urban dreamscape, in search for a way to reuinite with her long lost friend, Violet. Explore a story in the fray of space and time, where a heightened sense of adventure will lead to many curiosities.

name: The Exorcist: Legion VR
description: The Exorcist: Legion VR is an interactive VR experience set in the academy-award winning world created by horror maestro William Peter Blatty. Each chapter features a unique demonic entity that will test your courage and resolve. Available for HTC Vive and Oculus Rift. Not for the faint-hearted.

name: Tonari ni Kanojo no Iru Shiawase: Two Farce
description: It won’t be long before the historic literature club will be disbanded as there’s just the protagonist and his kouhai Chisa left. Even as they worry about the club’s future, they carried on with their daily trivial exchanges in the club room together. And so, they became closer by the day.

name: Super Trashforce
description: The near future. The world was flooded with waste from factories. Over time, almost all the land is bogged down in the waste. All garbage and chemicals were able to reach even to hell itself. Satan did not like it very much and he sent his creations to the ground in order to destroy all people for this garbage.

name: Earth Defense Force 4.1: Wing Diver the Shooter
description: A vertical-scrolling shoot ’em up spinoff of Earth Defense Force 4.1.

name: Stick Fight: Shadow Warrior
description:
Do you like fighter games? Do you enjoy stickman games? Are you ready for the stick fight extreme Stick Fight duel??
The hero of the casual stickman Stick Fight games is returning. The fight game with endless waves of ninja enemies hordes will test your brawl and survival skills. Become the ultimate stickman warrior boss in this free funny and hypercasual battle royale game.

name: Life Is A Game
description: Simulation game where you see the life of a person from birth until death. Your character is always running as time is always ticking. The life you live is dictated by the choices you make and the amount and type of coins you collect.

name: MP1: Lethal Lava Land
description: Sin descripción

name: Brutal Unreal 99
description: Brutal Unreal 99 combines the Unreal Tournament 99 weapons ripped by the user Voltlock + the enemies of Brutal Doom Monsters, a mod for Doom I & Doom II.

name: Dead Synchronicity: Tomorrow Comes Today
description:
"Dead Synchronicity: Tomorrow Comes Today" is the first part of the "Dead Synchronicity" series: help Michael face a dying reality, a universe that’s fading away. Face a merciless world that gets sick and vanishes. Face no past, no present, no future. Face the impending moment of “dead synchronicity”. And you’d better hurry. Because, otherwise... what will you do when Time dissolves itself?
A terrible pandemic is turning all of humanity into “the dissolved” - the sick whose deliria provide them with supernatural cognitive powers... but also steer them towards a gruesome death.

name: Ultra Zultra
description:
It's Pixel Platforming time!
Can you handle tough sweet procedurally generated levels?
Will you master the super tight controls?
If you ever reach the Peak Society Boss, will you defeat him and save HUMANITY?!?!
Find out only by playing Ultra Zultra.... TODAY!
Not convinced? We got tons of power ups and items that will
make your attempts less frustrating!

name: Middle-earth: Shadow of War - Slaughter Tribe Nemesis
description:
The Slaughter Tribe Nemesis Expansion includes:

• Thousands of NEW Nemesis System enemies, followers & stories
• NEW Orc weapons, fatalities and brutalities
• NEW Fortress, Outpost and Wilderness gameplay
• NEW Legendary Gear Set set for the Bright Lord

name: Injustice 2: Hellboy
description: As a member of the Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense, Hellboy has defended the world from fiends, witches, demons, and more than a few Lovecraftian Gods. With his trusty revolver and his “Right Hand of Doom,” Hellboy has made monster disposal his specialty.

name: Crossniq
description: Crossniq is a new tile-sliding puzzle game to be played with your mouse or your fingers! The goal of the game is to create a "cross" of same-colored tiles to clear them from the screen, which gives you points and refills your time meter. Keep on swiping and race against the clock!

name: Twisty Road!
description: How long can you stay on the Twisty Road? Roll along the road and shatter glass for points. If you're courageous​ enough, jump off the road to skip ahead. Be careful and don't fall for too long or game over!

name: Hi Crossword-Word Puzzle Game
description: Hi Crossword is a word game combining word search with crossword gameplay. All you need is to connect letter blocks and find hidden words.

name: The Jackbox Party Quadpack
description:
They said it couldn't be done, but somehow we crammed all the party-pleasing games from The Jackbox Party Packs 1, 2, 3, and 4 into one essential collection! That's 20 hysterical party games for one great price!

From The Jackbox Party Pack:
You Don't Know Jack 2015
Fibbage
Drawful
Lie Swatter
Word Spud

From The Jackbox Party Pack 2:
Quiplash XL
Fibbage 2
Earwax
Bidiots
Bomb Corp.

From The Jackbox Party Pack 3:
Trivia Murder Party
Guesspionage
Tee K.O.
Fakin' It
Quiplash 2

From The Jackbox Party Pack 4:
Fibbage 3 (with new game mode Fibbage: Enough About You)
Survive the Internet
Monster Seeking Monster
Bracketeering
Civic Doodle

Players use their internet-connected phones, tablets, or laptops as controllers! With this many games, you're going to need a lot more parties and a lot more friends!

name: My Coloring Book: Transport
description: This is a game which will help you spend your time in the best way possible! Be creative and make masterpieces using this wonderful game we have prepared for you.

name: AgeOfDarkness
description: Age Of Darkness is a Builder/Survival game set in the medieval period. Build up large City's and Town's with over 100 items with more on the way.

name: Batman: The Enemy Within - Episode 3: Fractured Mask
description: In this latest chapter from the award-winning studio behind Batman - The Telltale Series, both Bruce Wayne and Batman will be forced into precarious new roles. The Riddler has returned to terrorize Gotham City, but his gruesome puzzles merely foreshadow an even greater crisis. With the arrival of a ruthless federal agent and the return of a still nascent Joker, Batman must navigate uneasy alliances while Bruce Wayne undertakes a perilous series of deceptions.

name: Nogizaka46 Rhythm Festival
description: Rhythm game released on iOS and Android devices, contain songs from Japanese famous idol group Nogizaka46.

name: Super Game System Basic
description: Learn the basics of programming and create your own Games and Apps in Super Game System Basic. The SGS is a fictional 80's style system where with its own IDE for creating simple little games and apps. Ideal for young people just wanting to learn simple program flow and have fun doing it, or old retro enthusiasts wanting to see what they can do.

name: Axiom Verge: Multiverse Edition
description:
Includes: 
- Copy of the game disc/cartridge. 
- Deluxe booklet with developer’s commentary and art. 
- Double-sided poster with the world map and weapons/items in the game. 
- Exclusive making-of documentary. 
 
The Nintendo Switch version also includes the games soundtrack but costs an extra 10$ on the system.

name: Hell Survive
description: The epidemic swept the whole world. Zombies are looking for food, which is all living things on the planet. Doctors are trying to fix the epidemic and save the world. You are a mercenary who must destroy as many zombies as possible, because only you can reduce the population of evil and hungry zombies.

name: Strange Things
description: Indie game based on "completing runs". Different weapons and randomly generated maps make this game an endless fun.

name: Melodic Riddle
description: Make your logic work! Melodic Riddle is a puzzle game where the goal is to touch all white geometric shapes in one go!

name: Pure Mind
description:
Pure mind is a prototype of a virtual space emulation system. To make sure of its efficiency, its developers need volunteers to test. You were one of those. But everything was not so simple. 
In the power of the tester, dictating to you of the condition, the experimental is necessary to perform all the tests that the announcer puts, no matter how dangerous they turn out to be. 
In order to regain your freedom, you will have to explore the quirky structures that the developers or the system itself generated, overcome various dangerous obstacles such as lasers, thorns, huge pits, and other things that can kill you, and solve some puzzles! 
Exploring all the corners of strange rooms, you also can stumble upon some secrets. 
You have to go through 40 different levels, reveal all the secrets of the Pure Mind prototype, find out who is behind it.

name: Darkroom
description: Darkroom is a mystic novel. You wake up in complete darkness and you don’t know where you are or how you got there. Yet, there is someone else in this dark room.

name: VR Roller Coaster - Cave Depths
description: Experience the crazy Roller Coaster ride in Cave Depths. This 3D roller coaster will blow your mind with an exciting environment with more than 2 min ride. We have an interactive part in the experience, where you are choosing the direction where to go with head movement. Get ready for limitless Virtual Reality, powered by ARLOOPA.

name: Mystery Case Files: The Revenant's Hunt - Collector's Edition
description: Can you stop the Revenant before it’s too late?
